Kemenag: Agen Perjalanan Umroh Harus Ikuti Regulasi
05 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Munjir Permana


Kemenag: Agen Perjalanan Umroh Harus Ikuti Regulasi

KBRN, Banda Aceh : Kantor Wilayah Kementerian Agama Provinsi Aceh melalui Bidang Pelayanan Ibadah Haji dan Umrah menggelar kegiatan Rapat Koordinasi dan Sosialisasi izin Operasional Penyelenggaraan Perjalanan Ibadah Umrah Provinsi Aceh Tahun 2019 di Aula Arafah Asrama Haji Embarkasi Aceh Banda Aceh, Selasa (5/11/2019). 
Acara ini dibuka langsung oleh Kabid Penyelenggara Haji dan Umrah(PHU) Kementrian Agama Propinsi Aceh H. Samhudi, S.Si dengan nara sumber M.Noer Alya Fitra selaku Kasubbid Pemantauan dan Pengawasan Umrah dan Ibadah Haji Khusus pada Direktorat Bina Umrah dan Haji Khusus, Kementerian Agama.
Dalam sambutannya Samhudi  mengatakan dengan maraknya dan trend yang  meningkat jamaah umroh di masyarakat Aceh, dan beragaman pemahaman tentang perjalanan umrah berjalan sesuai aturan serta terhindar dari hal yang tidak diinginkan, maka perlulah  Penyelenggara Perjalanan Ibadah Umroh (PPIU), Perusahaan Travel memahami regulasi yang telah di tetapkan sesuai aturan yang baru dikeluarkan yaitu hal operasionalnya PPIU hendaknya mengikuti aturan terbaru sesuai UU nomor 8 tahun 2019/penyelenggara ibadah haji dan umrah.
“Terkait hal itu juga Kemenag tidak bermaksud mempersulit perusahanan travel dan  PPIU dalam menjalankan bisnisnya, namun harus mengetahui hak dan kewajiban agar konsumen terlindungi, karena ada PPIU yang belum mempunyai izin tapi sudah berani memberangkatkan jamaah umrah,” ujar Samhudi. 
“Dan agar bisnis  ini berdasarkan syariah Islam yang bebas dari unsur yang tidak di inginkan diharapkan peserta hendaknya mengikuti Sosialisasi  agar berjalan sesuai aturan,” tambah Samhudi.
Sementara itu,  M.Noer Alya Fitra memaparkan tentang pemahaman terhadap hak dan kewajiban yang harus dipatuhi sesuai regulasi yang ditetapkan, menyampaikan segala potensi resiko permasalahan yang akan timbul.
Menuruutnya, kewajiban yang harus di penuhi PPIU harus terdaftar pada kantor Kemenag. Lain dari itu atas layanan yang diberikan harus  menyediakan  bimbingan manasik, penerbangan, transportasi, catering, akomodasi, administrasi dan handing termasuk membikinan pelaporan dan juga konsumen yang ikut harus diikutkan asuransi untuk mengantisipasi adanya kegagalan pemberangkatan. 
“Selain dari itu untuk mempermudah dalam pengawasan, PPIU dalam menjalankan operasionalnya  wajib menggunakan aplikasi siskopatuh (system komputerisasi pengelolaan terpadu umroh dan haji khusus), serta sanksi- sanksi yang yang harus diterima bila tidak sesuai aturan,” ujarnya. 
Selain itu juga M.Noer mengatakan Kementerian Agama berupaya melakukan penyempurnaan sistem dan manajemen penyelenggaraan ibadah umrah secara terus menerus agar penyelenggaraan umrah dapat berjalan aman, tertib, dan lancar demi kenyamanan jamaah umroh sesuai hak yang harus mereka terima.
Bagi mereka yang telah di tetapkan berangkat akan mendapatkan surat pendaftaran pergi umrah, berikut surat perjanjian perjalanan ibadah umrah, bukti setoran jamaah serta id card.
Kegiatan ini di sesi tanya jawab hangat dan semangat serta pesan dan saran dari para peserta agar perizinan PPIU dapat dimudahkan perizinannya, seru salah satu peserta
Kegiatan fullday yang bertemakan" Dengan Sosialisasi Peraturan Penyelenggaraan Ibadah Umrah Kita Tingkatkan Pelayanan Masyarakat"  ini dikuti lebih dari dari 120 orang peserta yang terdiri dari 23 orang dari Kasi PHU Kemenag Kabupaten/Kota, 27 orang Pimpinan PPIU, 16 orang dari KBIH, dan sisanya dari PerusahaanTravel yang ada di Kabupaten/Kota serta juga adanya dari Polda Aceh.

Ministry of Religion: Umrah Travel Agents Must Follow Regulations
05 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Munjir Permana


Ministry of Religion: Umrah Travel Agents Must Follow Regulations

KBRN, Banda Aceh: Regional Office of the Ministry of Religion of the Province of Aceh through the Hajj and Umrah Pilgrimage Service Field held a Coordination Meeting and Socialization of Operational Permit for the Implementation of Aceh Province Umrah Travel in 2019 in the Arafat Hall of the Aceh Hajj Embarkation Hajj Dormitory, Tuesday (5/11 / 2019).
The event was opened directly by the Head of Hajj and Umrah Organizers (PHU) of the Ministry of Religion of the Province of Aceh H. Samhudi, S.Si with the resource person M.Noer Alya Fitra as the Head of the Umrah and Special Hajj Monitoring and Supervision Division at the Directorate of Bina Umrah and Special Hajj, Ministry of Religion.
In his remarks Samhudi said that with the rise and increasing trend of Umrah pilgrims in Acehnese society, and diverse understanding of Umrah travel according to the rules and avoiding unwanted things, it is necessary for the Umrah Pilgrimage Organizers (PPIU), Travel Companies to understand the regulations that have been in stipulate in accordance with the newly issued regulations, namely operational matters PPIU should follow the latest rules according to Law number 8 of 2019 / Hajj and Umrah organizers.
"Related to this also the Ministry of Religion does not intend to complicate travel companies and PPIU in conducting their business, but must know the rights and obligations so that consumers are protected, because there are PPIUs that do not yet have a permit but have dared to dispatch Umrah pilgrims," said Samhudi.
"And so that this business is based on Islamic sharia which is free of unwanted elements, it is expected that participants should take part in the socialization to run according to the rules," Samhudi added.
Meanwhile, M.Noer Alya Fitra explained about the understanding of the rights and obligations that must be obeyed in accordance with established regulations, conveying all the potential risk problems that will arise.
According to him, the obligations that PPIU must fulfill must be registered with the Ministry of Religion. Other than that for services provided must provide guidance manasik, aviation, transportation, catering, accommodation, administration and handing including making reports and also consumers who must be included insurance to anticipate the failure of departure.
"Apart from that, to facilitate supervision, PPIU in carrying out its operations must use the siskopatuh application (a computerized integrated management system for pilgrimage and special pilgrimage), as well as sanctions that must be accepted if it is not according to the rules," he said.
In addition, M.Noer said that the Ministry of Religion seeks to improve the system and management of the implementation of the Umrah continuously so that the implementation of the Umrah can run safely, orderly, and smoothly for the convenience of Umrah pilgrims according to the rights they must receive.
For those who have been determined to leave, they will get a registration letter to go to Umrah, following the Umrah pilgrimage agreement, proof of pilgrim's deposit and ID card.
This activity in the warm and enthusiastic question and answer session as well as messages and suggestions from the participants so that licensing for PPIU can be facilitated by licensing, exclaimed one participant
The full day event with the theme "With the Dissemination of the Regulations on Organizing Our Umrah Worship to Improve Community Services" was attended by more than 120 participants consisting of 23 people from the Head of District / City Ministry of Religion PHU, 27 people PPIU leaders, 16 people from KBIH, and the rest from Travel companies in the Regency / City and also the presence of the Aceh Regional Police.
